messages.title: Save Our Hospitals
messages.content: As your MP I'm standing up for our NHS every day. I need your help to do this.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, 5,000 more care workers and 3,000 more midwives to meet waiting time and improve hospital services.
Guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours.
Combine a cancer signup guarantee, giving older and disabled people more caring and effective support.

issues.health: The local Conservative plans to demolish Charing Cross Hospital, with the loss of its A&E, 93% of inpatient beds and its world-class stroke unit.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was shocked when I heard that the local Conservative party support the closure of our hospital services.

politicalExperience.duration: 30 years as an MP and councillor in Hammersmith & Fulham

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on the protection of local hospital services and the proposed closure of Charing Cross Hospital. The leaflet emphasizes the need for the reader's support to prevent cuts to the NHS and the closure of local services.
